{% if object_list %}
{section}
    {column:width=30%}
        {center}
        {chart:title= Server installs }
        || Total || Completed || Remaining || Scheduled ||
        || | {{ nInstalled }} | {{ nNotInstalled }} || {{ nScheduled }}
        {chart} 
        {center}
    {column}
    {column:width=30%}
        {center}
        {chart:title= Users }
        ||  || Disabled || Enabled ||
        || | {{ nUserDisabled }}  | {{ nUserEnabled }} ||
        {chart} 
        {center}
    {column}
    {column:width=30%}
        {center}
        {chart:title= Complexity }
        || Total || Completed || Remaining ||
        || | {{ nComplexDone }} | {{ nComplexNot }}
        {chart} 
        {center}
    {column}
{section}
{align:right}As of {{ dToday }}{align}

{section}
    || Application || Server || Level || Install Date || Installed || Complexity || Disable Delayed || Comments ||
    {% for obj in object_list %}| {% ifchanged obj.app.name%}*{{obj.app.name}}*{% endifchanged %} | {{obj.name}} | {{ obj.get_level_display }} | {{ obj.hostsetting.installdate }} | {%if obj.hostsetting.installed %}(/){% else %}(x){% endif %} | {%if obj.hostsetting.complexity %} (/) {% else %} (x) {% endif %} | {% if obj.hostsetting.delayed %}(-){% endif %} | {{ obj.comment }} |
    {% endfor %}
{section}
{% endif %}
